dict.string: Jarvis needs access to your contacts to help you send messages to people by name.
Jarvis needs access to your calendar to create, edit, and manage your events.
Jarvis needs access to your reminders to create, edit, and manage your tasks.
Jarvis needs full reminders access so it can read and update your tasks end-to-end.
Jarvis needs access to your photo library to save screenshots.
Jarvis may need location access for enhanced features and context.
Jarvis needs microphone access for voice conversations.
Jarvis needs camera access for video features and visual input.
Jarvis needs access to your music library to control playback and get information about currently playing songs.
Jarvis needs notification access to help manage alarms and reminders.
Jarvis needs access to run iOS Shortcuts and integrate with system features.
